detail_desc: Imitation suede slippers with soft pile linings and fluted soles.
Swim shorts with grosgrain stripes down the sides and an elasticated drawstring waist. Side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Mesh inner shorts.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal hair grips with glass rhinestones. Length 6.5 cm.
Short, gently fitted dress in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with short sleeves.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Suede sandals with two straps at the front with a metal buckle and concealed elastication, and an adjustable heel strap with a hook and loop fastening. Moulded suede insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Shirt in a patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with low heels, a loop at the back and a zip in one side with a star-shaped pull. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood. Deep V-neck with lacing at the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey with a lined front that gives the bust a natural shape and provides light support. Adjustable shoulder straps, no fasteners and an elastic hem.
Short jacket in soft faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front, side pockets and elastication at the back of the hem. Lined.

Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in an airy cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front and short slits in the sides. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Wide trousers in a patterned, softly draping viscose weave with concealed pockets in the side seams and a high waist with wide, covered elastication.

Shirt jacket in woven fabric with a double-layered drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric. Buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, pockets in the side seams and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the leg, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and raw-edge hems.
Puff pants in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems with a small frill trim.

Short, fitted top in recycled, sequined polyester chiffon with a harlequin pattern. Short, wide puff sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Lined. The sequins and zip are made from recycled polyester.
Cap in imitation suede with no fastener. Lined.
Boxy-style top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with short sleeves, a narrow trim around the neckline and rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Halterneck jumpsuit in a crêpe weave. Lace back with an open section, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck and a concealed zip in the side. Pleats at the front, a seam at the waist with a wide band, and wide legs. Unlined.
Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Metal hair grips in various designs decorated with pearly plastic beads and shells.
Small bucket bag in soft suede with a drawstring and narrow shoulder strap in leather at the top. Concealed magnetic fastening and one inner compartment. Cotton twill lining. Size 12x16x17 cm.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Waist belt with an embossed metal buckle. Width 3 cm.

Set with a knitted hooded jacket and pair of trousers in soft thermal fleece. Jacket with a pile-lined hood with ears at the top and a soft brushed inside. Trousers with wide jersey ribbing at the waist.

Padded baseball jacket in nylon with an embroidered motif on the chest, a striped stand-up collar and press-studs down the front. Welt side pockets with a concealed press-stud, an inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening, and striped ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining. Polyester filling.
Satin blouse with long sleeves, a V-neck with inset lace trims and wide cuffs with a covered button.
Soft bootees in pile with embroidery and appliqués. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2.3 cm.
Weekend bag in canvas with imitation leather details. Two handles and a zip at the top, two outer compartments, one with a zip and one zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 14x45x37 cm.
Wide, cropped T-shirt in stripe-print cotton jersey with a text print and striped ribbing around the neckline.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves. Flounce at the top and smocking at the hem.
Short, fitted dress in a softly draping, patterned viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back.

Short-sleeved polo shirt in piqué made from a cotton blend with a collar and button placket. The shirt incorporates COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
Short, fitted dress in stretch jersey with a print motif on the front and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Slightly longer at the back with a gently rounded hem.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned, raw-edge cuffs and a rounded, raw-edge hem.
Briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Top in jersey containing glittery threads with a V-neck and short puff sleeves with ribbed trims.
Short-sleeved top in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless top in jersey with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar with a twisted detail at the front and an opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck.
V-neck cardigan in a soft rib knit with hole-knit sections. Buttons down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a ribbed hem.

Block-coloured T-shirt in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Boxy style in a relaxed fit with a small embroidery detail at the top and ribbing around the neckline. The cotton content of the T-shirt is organic.
Hooded dress in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing at the cuffs and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long 5-pocket shorts in cotton twill with a regular waist and slightly lower crotch.
Pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric with a text print, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Vest tops in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a small scalloped trim at the top and a decorative bow at the front.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Skater skirt in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.

Shell trousers in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams. Adjustable elasticated waist, a reflective strip on one leg and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a glitter print on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hooded jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Set with a jacket and pair of trousers in soft, thermal fleece. Jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, chin guard, long raglan sleeves and contrasting colour trims at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist and trim at the hems.
Cold shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with a frill trim and long sleeves.

Long dress in an airy weave with a wrapover front, hook-and-eye fastener at the neckline and a concealed zip in one side. Gathers at the shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Seam with a wide, pleated panel at the waist, and a flared, pleated skirt. Lined.
Top in a cotton weave with short cap sleeves and a gathered, elasticated neckline.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Square, elasticated neckline with a scalloped trim, 3/4-length raglan sleeves with elastication and a scalloped trim at the cuffs, and an elasticated hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and ventilating mesh sections on the legs. The tights are made from recycled polyester.
Tops in soft jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Cropped top in jersey containing glittery threads with narrow shoulder straps.

Soft, non-wired bra in ribbed microfibre designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Running vest top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a zip at the top, reflective details and a ventilating mesh back.

Short, sleeveless dress in sequined mesh with a stand-up collar with fasteners at the back. Opening that runs down the back from the back of the neck with a concealed zip at the bottom. Jersey lining.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with double frills in woven fabric around the armholes.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and buttons down the front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved bodysuit, a pair of trousers and accessory in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
Oversized top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Jacket with a lined hood and soft, thermal fleece inside. Zip down the front, side pockets and ribbed cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Necklace of thin metal chains, two of which have pendants. Adjustable length.
Long-sleeved fitted top in jersey.
Elasticated fabric hair scrunchies with a bow.
Oversized jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
